scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css
scripts.copy-html: copy index.html public/index.html && copy dashboard.html public/dashboard.html && copy login.html public/login.html && copy register.html public/register.html
scripts.copy-css: copy style.css public/style.css && copy dashboard-style.css public/dashboard-style.css && copy login.css public/login.css
